name: Flammabomb Wood "Dancer" Street Lamp
description: A street lamp standing within the "Children of Echoes," constructed from processed "Flammabomb Wood" for the lamp post and supported by a robust rock base. Additionally, to enhance aesthetics, the designer equipped it with metal components, making the entire lamp resemble a dancing figure. Clearly, this design significantly increased the complexity of both manufacturing and maintenance. Fortunately, for the "Children of Echoes," renowned for its skilled craftsmen, this doesn't seem to be a challenge at all...
